mapper.select: SELECT yd_airplane.*,co.COUNTY_NAME,co.city_code,co.city_name,SUBSTR(yd_airplane.scc_code,1,2) AS scc1,SUBSTR(yd_airplane.scc_code,3,2) AS scc2, SUBSTR(yd_airplane.scc_code,5,3) AS scc3,SUBSTR(yd_airplane.scc_code,8,3) AS scc4 FROM yd_airplane LEFT JOIN ( SELECT county.COUNTY_ID,county.COUNTY_NAME,city.city_name,city.city_code FROM county LEFT JOIN city ON county.city_code=city.city_code ) co ON co.COUNTY_ID=yd_airplane.county_id where yd_airplane.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into yd_airplane
id,
year,
county_id,
scc_code,
source_descrip,
fuel_type,
activity_level,
fuel_annual_usage,
fuel_sulfur_usage,
pm10_emission,
pm25_emission,
co_emission,
so2_emission,
nox_emission,
vocs_emission,
bc_emission,
oc_emission,
nh3_emission,

insert into yd_airplane (id, year, county_id, scc_code, source_descrip, fuel_type, activity_level, fuel_annual_usage, fuel_sulfur_usage, pm10_emission, pm25_emission, co_emission, so2_emission, nox_emission, vocs_emission, bc_emission, oc_emission, nh3_emission ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{countyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sccCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sourceDescrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fuelType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{activityLevel,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{fuelAnnualUsage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{fuelSulfurUsage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{vocsEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, year = #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, scc_code = #{sccCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, source_descrip = #{sourceDescrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fuel_type = #{fuelType,jdbcType=CHAR}, activity_level = #{activityLevel,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, fuel_annual_usage = #{fuelAnnualUsage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, fuel_sulfur_usage = #{fuelSulfurUsage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pm10_emission = #{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pm25_emission = #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, co_emission = #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, so2_emission = #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nox_emission = #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, vocs_emission = #{vocsEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bc_emission = #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, oc_emission = #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nh3_emission = #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}

INSERT INTO yd_airplane (id, year, county_id, scc_code, source_descrip, fuel_type, activity_level, fuel_annual_usage, fuel_sulfur_usage, pm10_emission, pm25_emission, co_emission, so2_emission, nox_emission, vocs_emission, bc_emission, oc_emission, nh3_emission ) VALUES
( id = #{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, year = #{item.year,jdbcType=CHAR}, county_id = #{item.countyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, scc_code = #{item.sccCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, source_descrip = #{item.sourceDescrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fuel_type = #{item.fuelType,jdbcType=CHAR}, activity_level = #{item.activityLevel,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, fuel_annual_usage = #{item.fuelAnnualUsage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, fuel_sulfur_usage = #{item.fuelSulfurUsage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pm10_emission = #{item.pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pm25_emission = #{item.pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, co_emission = #{item.coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, so2_emission = #{item.so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nox_emission = #{item.noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, vocs_emission = #{item.vocsEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bc_emission = #{item.bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, oc_emission = #{item.ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nh3_emission = #{item.nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE} )
mapper.update:
update yd_airplane
year = #{year,jdbcType=CHAR},
county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=CHAR},
scc_code = #{sccCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
source_descrip = #{sourceDescrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fuel_type = #{fuelType,jdbcType=CHAR},
activity_level = #{activityLevel,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
fuel_annual_usage = #{fuelAnnualUsage,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
fuel_sulfur_usage = #{fuelSulfurUsage,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pm10_emission = #{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pm25_emission = #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
co_emission = #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
so2_emission = #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
nox_emission = #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
vocs_emission = #{vocsEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
bc_emission = #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
oc_emission = #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
nh3_emission = #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
